#include<stdio.h>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int gpf (int n, int p) {
   int s = sqrt(n) + 0.5;
   for (int i = p; i <= s; ++i) {
       if (n%i == 0) return gpf(n/i, i);
   }
   return n;
}

int solve (int n) {
    if (n == 1) return 0;
    else return 1 + solve(n/gpf(n, 2));
}

int main() {
   int t, n;
   scanf("%d", &t);
   while (t--) {
       scanf("%d", &n);
       printf("%d\n", solve(n));
   }
}
